name: صراع
description:
Check out some of my other games! Aml | Souls قد يعتقد البعض ان هذه الحكاية لا تخصهم لكنهم مخطؤون - Some may think this story does not belong to them, but they are wrong. في عالم ملئ بالصراعات قد ينسى البعض أهمية الانسان. لعبة صراع تحكي قصة طفل سوري يعاني مرارة الحرب فقد تحولت مدرستة إلي معسكر للجند وتحول منزله الي كومة من التراب ولكن هذا لم يكن يقارن ابدا بفقده والده تدور احداث اللعبة حول الطفل مازن الذي فقد والده في الحرب. يعثر مازن على كاميرا تصوير قديمة هي كل ما بقى له من ذكرى والده ولكن هذه الكاميرا ليست كأي كاميرا فهي تري الماضي، تري الحياة قبل الحرب على مازن ان يستعمل كاميرا والده المميزة لتخطى العقبات وانهاء الصراع In a world full of conflicts, some may forget the importance of the human being. Struggle game that tells the story of a Syrian child suffering from the bitterness of war. His school has turned into a soldier’s camp and his house has turned into a pile of dirt, but this was never compared to losing his father. The game revolve around the child, Mazen, who lost his father in the war. Mazen finds an old camera that is all he has left of his father's memory, but this camera is not like any other camera, it sees the past, it sees life before the war.. Mazen must use his father's camera to overcome obstacles and end the conflict.

Use your camera to see the world before the war ! 

Try to solve the game Puzzles!

Have Fun! 😊

  • All rights reserved for Lagg Studio.
  • The game made for 6wrni Game Jam 3 under the them ("memory").
  • All code and art were made by Lagg studio during the time of the jam.
  • Background music source Syria (Original) .
  • All SFX are free source assets with license 0. 
  • Use WS or Arrow to move.
  • Use Space to Jump
  • Use mouse right click open camera.
  • Use mouse lift click to move the camera.

Development Team

  • Developer - Ahmed Mostafa (Twitter)
